1.0.2.name: wordpress/pixopoint-theme-integrator
1.0.2.description:
Dynamically integrates your WordPress theme into other softwares. Adds the ability to use WordPress widgets in many other softwares including phpBB, vBulletin, bbPress etc. Visit the PixoPoint Theme Integrator Plugin page for more information about the plugin.

Live Demo

To see a live demo of the plugin in action, please visit our support forum or the GreekBerry Case Study post.

Features

  • Assists you to integrates your WordPress theme with other softwares
  • Allows you to use WordPress widgets in other softwares
  • Changes to your WordPress theme will automatically appear in your other software
  • Plus much more
